name: The Sentinel (itch)
description:
A very simple game made for #1BitClickerJam!

I was very intrigued by the theme and wanted to try out Unity. Wish I had more time to spend on the game.

Play the role of a security turret on a long-forgotten alien planet trying to destroy the evil intruders who dares to pass!

Mouse look, left click to fire.

Thanks for playing!
